thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Sasha

author: Sasha
title: Sasha
text: I've bought about 6 or 7 books now, and I'm definitely happy with my purchases. Everything on this site is so inexpensive, it just makes me want to read more and more! It takes a while to ship, but how can anyone complain when you're getting books for $2-6 dollars a piece, plus free shipping most of the time? I would recommend this site to everyone, especially my book lovers, and I hope Thriftbooks becomes more popular in the future.
